english_example_sentence: The young man who has been waiting at the door for a long time is you.
russian_example_sentence: Молодой человек, который долго ждет у двери, это ты.
turkish_example_sentence: Kapıda uzun süredir bekleyen genç adam sensin.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Kapıda uzun süredir ______ genç adam sensin.
